verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> cause <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> Your <S%H4351>birth<s%> and your <S%H4138>nativity<s%> is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> was an <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> an <S%H2850>Hittite.<s%>

And as for your <S%H4138>nativity,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H3205>born<s%> your <S%H8270>navel<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> were you <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>supple<s%> you; you were not <S%H4414>salted<s%> at all, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2853>swaddled<s%> at all.

<S%H3808>None<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> you, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> to you, to have <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on you; but you were <S%H7993>cast<s%> out in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> to the <S%H1604>loathing<s%> of your <S%H5315>person,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H3205>born.<s%>

And when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by you, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> you <S%H947>polluted<s%> in your own <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to you when you were in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>Live;<s%> yes, I <S%H559>said<s%> to you when you were in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>Live.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> you to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as the <S%H6779>bud<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and you have <S%H7235>increased<s%> and waxen <S%H1431>great,<s%> and you are <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments:<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are <S%H3559>fashioned,<s%> and your <S%H8181>hair<s%> is <S%H6779>grown,<s%> whereas you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore.<s%>

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by you, and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on you, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H6256>time<s%> was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love;<s%> and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> yes, I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> and you <S%H1961>became<s%> mine.
Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I you with <S%H4325>water;<s%> yes, I thoroughly <S%H7857>washed<s%> away your <S%H1818>blood<s%> from you, and I <S%H5480>anointed<s%> you with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you also with <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H7553>work,<s%> and <S%H5274>shod<s%> you with <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> skin, and I <S%H2280>girded<s%> you about with fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and I <S%H3680>covered<s%> you with <S%H4897>silk.<s%>
I <S%H5710>decked<s%> you also with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> your <S%H1627>neck.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>jewel<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> your <S%H639>forehead,<s%> and <S%H5694>earrings<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> on your <S%H7218>head.<s%>

Thus were you <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and your <S%H4403>raiment<s%> was of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H4897>silk,<s%> and <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H7553>work;<s%> you did <S%H398>eat<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil:<s%> and you were <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful,<s%> and you did <S%H6743>prosper<s%> into a <S%H4410>kingdom.<s%>

And your <S%H8034>renown<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for your <S%H3308>beauty:<s%> for it was <S%H3632>perfect<s%> through my <S%H1926>comeliness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H7760>put<s%> on you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

But you did <S%H982>trust<s%> in your own <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of your <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and <S%H8210>poured<s%> out your <S%H8457>fornications<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passed<s%> by; his it was.

And of your <S%H899>garments<s%> you did <S%H3947>take,<s%> and <S%H6213>decked<s%> your <S%H1116>high<s%> places with <S%H2921>divers<s%> <S%H2921>colors,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> thereupon: the like things shall not <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be so.

You have also <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of my <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> you, and <S%H6213>made<s%> to yourself <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men,<s%> and did <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution<s%> with them,
And <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and covered them: and you have <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

My <S%H3899>meat<s%> also <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you, fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> with which I <S%H398>fed<s%> you, you have even <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell:<s%> and thus it was, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Moreover you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> to me, and these have you <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to them to be <S%H398>devoured.<s%> Is this of your <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> a <S%H4592>small<s%> matter,
That you have <S%H7819>slain<s%> my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to cause them to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the fire for them?

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when you <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore,<s%> and <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H947>polluted<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H188>(woe,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> to you! <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%>)
That you have also <S%H1129>built<s%> to you an <S%H1354>eminent<s%> place, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> you an <S%H7413>high<s%> place in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>street.<s%>

You have <S%H1129>built<s%> your <S%H7413>high<s%> place <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and have made your <S%H3308>beauty<s%> to be <S%H8581>abhorred,<s%> and have <S%H6589>opened<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitutions.<s%>

You have also <S%H2181>committed<s%> <S%H2181>fornication<s%> with the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitutions,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> therefore I have <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and have <S%H1639>diminished<s%> your <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> food, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> you to the <S%H5315>will<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> which are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

You have played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> also with the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H804><s%> <S%H1115>because<s%> you were <S%H1115>insatiable;<s%> <S%H7654><s%> yes, you have played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with them, and yet could not be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

You have moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>fornication<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H3778>Chaldea;<s%> and <S%H1571>yet<s%> you were not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H2063>therewith.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H535>weak<s%> is your <S%H3826>heart,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> seeing you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H7986>imperious<s%> <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%>

In that you <S%H1129>build<s%> your <S%H1354>eminent<s%> place in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> your <S%H7413>high<s%> place in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>street;<s%> and have not <S%H1961>been<s%> as an <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> in that you <S%H7046>scorn<s%> <S%H868>hire;<s%>
But as a <S%H802>wife<s%> that <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> which <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of her <S%H376>husband!<s%>

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2181>whores:<s%> but you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H7809>hire<s%> them, that they may <S%H935>come<s%> to you on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> for your <S%H8457>prostitution.<s%>

And the <S%H2016>contrary<s%> is in you from other <S%H802>women<s%> in your <S%H8457>prostitutions,<s%> whereas <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H310>follows<s%> you to <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitutions:<s%> and in that you <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H868>reward,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H868>reward<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> to you, therefore you are <S%H2016>contrary.<s%>
<S%H3651>Why,<s%> O <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> your <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was <S%H8210>poured<s%> out, and your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> through your <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> with your <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did <S%H5414>give<s%> to them;

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>lovers,<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> you have taken <S%H6149>pleasure,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> them that you have <S%H157>loved,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> them that you have <S%H8130>hated;<s%> I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and will <S%H1540>discover<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> to them, that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

And I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you, as women that <S%H5003>break<s%> <S%H5003>wedlock<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

And I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall <S%H2040>throw<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H1354>eminent<s%> place, and shall <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> your <S%H7413>high<s%> places: they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> you also of your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels,<s%> and <S%H5117>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore.<s%>

They shall also <S%H5927>bring<s%> up a <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> you with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H1333>thrust<s%> you through with their <S%H2719>swords.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> your <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women:<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and you <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

So will I make my <S%H2534>fury<s%> toward you to <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from you, and I will be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> and will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3707>angry.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> but have <S%H7264>fretted<s%> me in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things; <S%H1887>behold,<s%> therefore I <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> on your <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> and you shall not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that uses <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> shall <S%H4911>use<s%> this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> As is the <S%H517>mother,<s%> so is her <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

You are your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> that <S%H1602>lothes<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>children;<s%> and you are the <S%H269>sister<s%> of your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H582>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>children:<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%> was an <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and your <S%H1>father<s%> an <S%H567>Amorite.<s%>

And your <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> she and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand:<s%> and your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> at your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

Yet have you not <S%H1980>walked<s%> after their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor <S%H6213>done<s%> after their <S%H8441>abominations:<s%> but, as if that were a <S%H6985>very<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> thing, you were <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> more than they in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> your <S%H269>sister<s%> has not <S%H6213>done,<s%> she nor her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> as you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> you and your <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> was the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> <S%H1347>pride,<s%> <S%H7653>fullness<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H7962>abundance<s%> of <S%H8252>idleness<s%> was in her and in her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did she <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
And they were <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> and <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: therefore I <S%H5493>took<s%> them <S%H5493>away<s%> as I <S%H7200>saw<s%> good.

That you may <S%H5375>bear<s%> your own <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and may be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> in that you are a <S%H5162>comfort<s%> to them.

For your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> was not <S%H8052>mentioned<s%> by your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H1347>pride,<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> was <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> as at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H5439>round<s%> about her, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> which <S%H7590>despise<s%> you <S%H5439>round<s%> about.
You have <S%H5375>borne<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

That you may <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and be <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H6610>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H3639>shame,<s%> when I am <S%H3722>pacified<s%> toward you for <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
